name: Huectagon - Brain teaser
description:
Huectagon is an addicting yet always challenging brain teaser.
Challenge your brain and puzzle solving skills with this addictive game and be entertained for hours, with his easy to learn yet hard to master gameplay.

Think on your feat and solve your way to the highest score among your friends, in a back and fourth battle between you and the board. Get as many Rainbow Blocks, and aim for the stars.

Huectagon key features:
 - Play everywhere and every time.
 - Challenge your brain in school, work, or even while waiting for the bus, with an always refreshing gameplay you will never get board.
 - Get started easily, and master your way above your friends and the world.
 - Don't have much time? Game saves automatically so you wont have to worry, your progress is always saved.
